gene_group: ////Other_GeneID:the related gene's GeneID ////Other_tax_id:the related gene's tax_id////relationship:the type of relationship between the two genes, e.g. GeneID has a 'relationship' to Other GeneID,included:----Ortholog----Potential readthrough sibling----Readthrough child----Readthrough parent----Readthrough sibling----Region member----Region parent----Related functional gene----Related pseudogene
_db_description: Gene integrates information from a wide range of species. A record may include nomenclature, Reference Sequences (RefSeqs), maps, pathways, variations, phenotypes, and links to genome-, phenotype-, and locus-specific resources worldwide.
_subdb_description: report of genes and their relationships to other genes
